keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clean-break Brexit means: 1) The UK's a sovereign, democratic nation-state 2) We control our own laws and borders 3) We're free to make trade deals with the world 4) We command our own national security 5) We save at least £39bn in EU payments

issues.brexitEurope: Clean-Break Brexit means: The UK's a sovereign, democratic nation-state, We control our own laws and borders, We're free to make trade deals with the world, We command our own national security, We save at least £39bn in EU payments

images.caption: WE ARE READY FOR A CLEAN-BREAK BREXIT

leaflet.additionalNotes: Tory PM Boris Johnson recycling Theresa May's Withdrawal Agreement won't do. Even without the Irish backstop, it's the worst deal in history.
